page.title: 17PUBLIC TRANSPORT SERVICES
page.content: Linkenholt has a bus service everyday but Sunday; it is provided by a private company, Parnham's of Ludgershall. The bus arrives at 8.00am and 4.30pm daily. These buses are used also to take the children to and from school. On Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday there is also a 9.30am and a 1.45pm bus. Since the teachers' dispute, Andover schools have closed early, so that the childrens' bus now comes home at 3.00pm. For the past year the bus company has been running at a big loss and it is thought that there will be changes in the system. Faccombe has only 1 bus service on one day a week, - Saturday. Most families have one private car and some young men own motor bikes.
